entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Longueuil
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Temperature: -9.7°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
